functions.name: createAndPositionElement
functions.description: Creates a tab context menu item.

id.description: The id of the element being created.

class.description: The class of the element being created.

accesskey.description: The access key for the element.

oncommand.description: The name of the function to execute oncommand.

onclick.description: The name of the function to execute when the created element is clicked.

label.description: The label of the element being created.

modifiers.description: The modifiers for the activation key.

hidden.description: The visibility status of the element.

parameters.name: aAdjacentTo
parameters.description: The id of the element that will be used to position the new element.

parameters.name: aPosition
parameters.description: The position relative to the target element. If no position is given the new element will be appeneded.

functions.name: createElementAs
functions.description: Get the specified attribute from the given element id.

parameters.name: aTag
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

parameters.name: aAttrs
parameters.description: The attribute of the element to retrieve.

id.description: The id of the element being created.

customizable.description: The access key for the element.

context.description: The access key for the element.

mode.description: The access key for the element.

flex.description: The access key for the element.

width.description: The access key for the element.

parameters.name: aSetAs
parameters.description: String identifier to determine what to set the created element as.

functions.name: registerStatusBar
functions.description: Register StatusBar.jsm with the current top window.

parameters.name: aId
parameters.description: The id of the element to search for.

functions.name: overrideStatusPanelLabel
functions.description: Register StatusBar.jsm with the current top window.

functions.name: configureBottomBox
functions.description: Register StatusBar.jsm with the current top window.

functions.name: initialized
functions.description: Returns a boolean indicating if statusBar is initialized in the current window.
